Biting-Hoarfrost.name: Biting Hoarfrost
Biting-Hoarfrost.materialComponent: a handful of snow or chalk dust
description: You blow the white powder from your hand, turning your breath into a chilling blast of arctic wind.

@;Each creature;@ in a @;30-foot cone;@ must make a @;Constitution;@ saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes @;2d6 cold damage;@ and is @;restrained;@ in ice. On a successful save, the target takes half damage and is not restrained.
To break out, the restrained target can use its action to make a @;Strength check;@ against your spell save DC. On a success, the target escapes and is no longer restrained by the ice.
@+At Higher Levels.+@ When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the size of the cone increases by 10 feet and the cold damage increases by 1d6 for each slot above 2nd.

Forked-Lightning.name: Forked Lightning
description: You create two arcs of lightning that streak towards @;two different targets;@. Make a @;ranged spell attack;@ roll for each arc. On a hit, the target takes @;2d8 lightning;@ damage. If both targets are hit and within @;30 feet of each other;@, another arc of lightning forms between them, and they each take an extra @;1d8 lightning;@ damage.
@+At Higher Levels.+@ When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage of each initial arc increases by @;1d8;@ for each slot level above 2nd.

Storm-Hammer.name: Storm Hammer
description: You pull your hand down, causing a colossal hammer of lightning to crash down upon a location within @;150 feet;@. All creatures in @;20 foot radius;@ of the point of impact must make a @;Dexterity;@ saving throw or take @;4d8 bludgeoning damage;@ and @;4d8 lightning damage;@, or half as much on a success.
The area affected by the spell becomes scorched and unstable, counting as @;difficult terrain;@ for the next month. This spell deals double damage against objects and structures.
@+At Higher Levels.+@ When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the @;lightning damage;@ increases by @;1d8;@ for each slot level above 6th.
